title: Range Over Channels
description: This lab aims to test your ability to iterate over values received from a channel using the for and range syntax in Golang.

meta.title: Range Over Channels in Golang
meta.description: Learn how to iterate over values received from a channel using the for and range syntax in Golang.
meta.keywords: go playground, channels, go, for loop, golang, programming tutorial, go labs, go playground online, range, go lab

verify.name: Verify Go Program Outputs 'one'
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
